response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value for you, estimated at $1,500,000, and I believe it would greatly enhance your endeavors or personal collection. We are offering this remarkable piece to you at a special price of $1,350,000. This offer represents a unique chance to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive price.

Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. We are committed to providing you with the best service and ensuring a smooth transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
